messages.subject: Re: OT: Apology
messages.msgSnippet: ... due ... I hope you get better. Don t worry, a lot of people aren t active as they are busy with other shinsengumi related stuff. ^_^ Either way it s nice
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "darkmalik" <jcolburn1@c...> wrote:
>
> Hi everyone, I'm sorry I've been absent but I've been really sick
due
> to the weather and all and I'm still sick. I'm just writing to let
> everyone know why I'm not very active lately.

I hope you get better. Don't worry, a lot of people aren't active as
they are busy with other shinsengumi related stuff. ^_^ Either way
it's nice to hear from you.

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] OT: Apology
messages.msgSnippet: No worries. Hope you get better soon though. ~Okita ... From: darkmalik To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com Sent: Thursday, October 07, 2004 11:14 AM Subject: [SHQ] OT:
messages.messageBody:
No worries. Hope you get better soon though.

~Okita
----- Original Message -----
From: darkmalik
To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, October 07, 2004 11:14 AM
Subject: [SHQ] OT: Apology



Hi everyone, I'm sorry I've been absent but I've been really sick due
to the weather and all and I'm still sick. I'm just writing to let
everyone know why I'm not very active lately.

messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone, I'm sorry I've been absent but I've been really sick due
to the weather and all and I'm still sick. I'm just writing to let
everyone know why I'm not very active lately.
